body_html:
This happens on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS. GCC 6.4 is not supported, and won't be until at least CUDA 9.2

https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/1028112/cuda-setup-and-installation/nvcc-bug-related-to-gcc-6-lt-tuple-gt-header-/

The build system should probably allow for passing CUDA_HOST_COMPILER into the CMake build as a workaround.

https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/1028112/cuda-setup-and-installation/nvcc-bug-related-to-gcc-6-lt-tuple-gt-header-/
The build system should probably allow for passing CUDA_HOST_COMPILER into the CMake build as a workaround.
body:
This happens on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS. GCC 6.4 is not supported, and won't be until at least CUDA 9.2

https://devtalk.nvidia.com/default/topic/1028112/cuda-setup-and-installation/nvcc-bug-related-to-gcc-6-lt-tuple-gt-header-/

The build system should probably allow for passing CUDA_HOST_COMPILER into the CMake build as a workaround.
